items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: MagillaStream is a portable RTMP server application designed for streamers who want to broadcast to YouTube and Twitch with customizable settings. Despite its powerful capabilities, including a user-friendly GUI and integrated binaries for streamlined setup, MagillaStream remains lightweight in operation and easy to use.
items.title: billboyles/magillastream: MagillaStream is a portable RTMP server application designed for streamers who want to broadcast to YouTube and Twitch with customizable settings. Despite its powerful capabilities, including a user-friendly GUI and integrated binaries for streamlined setup, MagillaStream remains lightweight in operation and easy to use.

items.content_html: RosettaJS-i18n is a lightweight internationalization (i18n) solution designed for small to medium e-commerce sites. It provides a simple, intuitive API for translations, pluralization, number and date formatting, and more.
